Education

2016

High School

In 2016, I completed high school at a public school, where I developed important values and began my interest in the technology field.

2019

Supermarket 2019-2021

In 2019 I joined the supermarket in my first registered job, gaining work experience and finishing in 2021.

2022 to date

Second Job at Catuai Labels

In 2022 I joined the Catuai Rotulos printing company, where I entered the flexography market, printing high-quality labels and stickers.

2024

University

2024 was the year I began my studies in software engineering, where I fell even more in love with the technology area, actively seeking and studying to acquire new knowledge and stay up to date in the market.
